metadata.name: PUA - Advanced Port Scanner Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of Advanced Port Scanner.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\advanced_port_scanner')) AND contains(lower(process.file.name), lower('advanced_port_scanner')) AND contains(lower(device.desc), lower('advanced port scanner')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/portable')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/lng'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of Advanced Port Scanner.

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Legitimate administrative use 2. Tools with similar commandline (very rare) Reference: https://github.com/3CORESec/MAL-CL/tree/master/Descriptors/Other/Advanced%20Port%20Scanner
